snippet: Investment and factory output were weaker than expected, indicating a further cooling in the Chinese economy.
abstract: China's investment and factory production fails to meet August forecasts, indicating continued slowing of economy.
lead_paragraph: Investment and factory output were weaker than expected, indicating a further cooling in the Chinese economy.

headline.main: Economic Growth in China Missed Forecasts in August
headline.print_headline: Growth in China Fell Short of Forecasts in August
